attributes.action: ban all companies using the computerised calling to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is very annoying and in a lot of cases worrying when the phone rings and no one answers,it is time that this goverment stopped this , one never knows if or who is on the line ,the vunerable people are afraid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
